to divide/to separate/to distribute/to allocate/to distinguish (good and bad)/part or subdivision/fraction/one tenth (of certain units)/unit of length equivalent to 0.33 cm/minute (unit of time)/minute (angular measurement unit)/a point (in sports or games)/0.01 yuan (unit of money)
to split/to crack/to break open/to rend

sentences.english: Pollen mother cell division showed massive failure and bare fertility occurred.
sentences.chinese: 花粉母細胞分裂多半異常且無生殖結子能力。

sentences.english: Cytokinin has the characteristic of delaying plant cell and tissue senescence.
sentences.chinese: 細胞分裂素具有延緩植物細胞和組織衰老的特性。

sentences.english: Replication of methylation patterns by DNA methyltransferases maintains genome stability through cell division.
sentences.chinese: 甲基化作用可以使基因組在細胞分裂過程中保持穩定。

sentences.english: Breast Cancer Cells Dividing This confocal micrograph shows two human breast cancer cells dividing.
sentences.chinese: 這張顯微共聚焦照片是兩個人乳腺癌細胞分裂過程圖。

sentences.english: That process involves a complicated form of cell division.
sentences.chinese: 這個過程是個非常複雜的細胞分裂形式。

sentences.english: They are preserved during cell division and are passed on to the daughter cells.
sentences.chinese: 細胞分裂時它們被保留並傳遞給子細胞。

sentences.english: Greider explained that, when cells divide, a little material gets sheared off the ends of the chromosomes.
sentences.chinese: 格蕾德告訴我們，細胞分裂時染色體端粒會發生降解。

sentences.english: More of the cells in our skin and muscles pide during the night hours than during the day.
sentences.chinese: 我們的皮膚和肌肉裏的細胞分裂在夜間比在白天要多。

sentences.english: More of the cells in our skin and muscles divide dring the night hours than during the day.
sentences.chinese: 我們的皮膚和肌肉裏的細胞分裂在夜間比在白天要多。

sentences.english: In telophase the cell was divided into two secondary spermatocytes.
sentences.chinese: 末期細胞分裂爲兩個次級精母細胞。

sentences.english: Natural cytokinins are all derivatives of adenine.
sentences.chinese: 天然的細胞分裂素是腺嘌呤的衍生物。

sentences.english: Studied the affection of medical stone on the seed germination and cell division of cucumber.
sentences.chinese: 研究了麥飯石對黃瓜種子萌發和細胞分裂的影響。

sentences.english: Estrogen, on the other hand, slows down cell division, leading to a shorter digit.
sentences.chinese: 而另一方面，雌激素會減緩細胞分裂，使手指變短。

sentences.english: The antisera cross-react mainly with DHZR-group cytokinins.
sentences.chinese: 該抗血清主要與本組細胞分裂素髮生交叉反應。

sentences.english: More of the cells in our skin and muscles spanide during the night hours than during the day.
sentences.chinese: 我們的皮膚和肌肉裏的細胞分裂在夜間比在白天要多。

sentences.english: Effect of cytokinin on the induction and macromolecules metabolic kinetics of somatic embryogenesis in Phalaenopsis sp.
sentences.chinese: 細胞分裂素對蝴蝶蘭體細胞胚誘導及大分子代謝研究。
